for _ in range(input()):
	n=input()
	temp=n
	a,b,c=[],[],0
	while temp:
		temp-=1
		s=raw_input().split()
		a.append(s[0])
		b.append(s[1])
	for i in range(n):
		if b[i]=='+':
			c+=1
		else:
			c-=1
		j=i-1
		while j>=0 and a[i]!=a[j]:
			j-=1
		if j>=0:
			if b[j]=='+':
				c-=1
			else:
				c+=1
	print c
